plot: Thomas is a 23 year old, self-proclaimed boy. To become what he defines as a real man, he undertakes a series of tough, painful and humiliating challenges. All this is far outside his comfort zone.
plot_en: Thomas is a 23 year old, self-proclaimed boy. To become what he defines as a real man, he undertakes a series of tough, painful and humiliating challenges. All this is far outside his comfort zone.
plot_es: Thomas is a 23 year old, self-proclaimed boy. To become what he defines as a real man, he undertakes a series of tough, painful and humiliating challenges. All this is far outside his comfort zone.
title: Thomas Blir Mann
